title: Identity Platform Trulioo Joins Google’s Agent Payments Protocol
description: Identity platform Trulioo has joined Google’s Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) initiative, which creates a common language for how artificial intelligence agents can initiate and complete transactions on behalf of users. Trulioo will bring to the AP2 initiative …
